game.name: NINJA CATS: Tactics
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 전략

game.shortDescription: Build the ultimate ninja squad with your voice! NINJA CATS: Tactics is a battle RPG where communicating with your ninja cats builds trust. Train and nurture them through voice commands, shaping their skills and abilities. Enjoy chatting with them or streaming your adventure—it's up to you!
